DOC.brief_summary: Tenofovir disoproxil fumarate ( also know tenofovir DF Viread ) use anti-HIV drug treat HIV infection . Taking tenofovir DF every day may also prevent HIV infection . This study determine take tenofovir DF tablet every day safe effective prevent HIV infection . Participants study sex worker Phnom Penh , Cambodia .
DOC.brief_title: Daily Tenofovir DF Prevent HIV Infection Among Sex Workers Cambodia
DOC.detailed_description: Cambodia one high rate HIV infection Southeast Asia . At end 2002 , HIV infection rate among Cambodian sex worker range 14.8 % 28.8 % . Tenofovir DF nucleotide reverse transcriptase inhibitor ( NRTI ) license treatment HIV-1 infection United States Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) October 2001 . This randomized clinical trial determine daily oral 300 mg dose tenofovir DF safe effective prevent HIV-1 infection . This collaborative study University California , San Francisco , University New South Wales , Ministry Health Cambodia . Nine hundred sixty HIV uninfected female sex worker Phnom Penh enrol trial . Participants randomize receive either 300 mg tenofovir DF placebo daily 12 month . Participants evaluate rate HIV infection , adherence drug regimen , change risk behavior . All participant monitor throughout trial side effect toxicity . Participants involve study 14 month .
